thread.section_title: Ascendtech, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ascendtech, Inc. | www.ascendtech.us
thread.title: victor williams
thread.title_full: Ascendtech, Inc. reviewed by victor williams

author: victor williams
title: victor williams
text: I am really pleased with my tablet it is like new and everything works fine but what surprised me was the technical assistance I received from their techs.I had a few questions about the operation of my tablet I bought from them and was helped no questions.That is why this seller is top rated with Ebay they care about their customers.Thanks again Victor
